document_data.mainbody:
ammond Kraddoc was a representative of the Vintners, Distillers and Brewers Guild in Waterdeep in the early 1490s DR.
In 1492 DR, Hammond possibly went into business with the new owners of the Trollskull Manor.
Hammond disliked adventurers but liked their coin. He liked arriving in the middle of the month to talk about all the new spirits produced by the guild. He also chastised tavern owners for their current selection of beverages, even if hed previously sold them those goods, in order to test their willingness to cooperate.
Hammond had always at his side Jinny, a tiefling scribe who silently recorded notes and conversations.
